title: 2009 Documentary Series - Cards Due by November 20th!
body: An update on our 2009 Documentary Film Series! We're running out of time before the True/False passes are for sale, and we've had quite a few cards filled up. So - EVEN IF YOU HAVEN'T COMPLETED IT, or you only have ONE STAMP, drop it by this week for a chance to win a Simple Pass to this year's True False Film Festival in Columbia, Feb. 25 - 28! We'll be doing 2 drawings: one for the card with the most stamps, and then a random card. YOU MUST TURN IT IN BY FRIDAY, NOVEMBER 20, 2009 to be eligible!!! Also, Missouri State has been sponsoring a series of films this semester at The Moxie, with a documentary counterpart following. This week we'll be showing Werner Herzog's FITZCARRALDO and then a couple weeks later BURDEN OF DREAMS. These films are free and open to the public, and we have sign-up sheet at the box office for a chance to win a free pass to True False, courtesy of the Department of Media, Film, and Journalism! So make sure to stop by and catch a free movie (donations are gladly accepted for the department), and enter to win!
author: Nicole
